greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1, for n > 1, a(n) = A020639(n)^A048724(A067029(n)) * a(A028234(n)).
comment: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^A048724(e), where A048724(e) = (e XOR 2e).
Multiples of 8 in the ring defined in A329329. - _Peter Munn_, Jan 17 2020
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..12167
xref: Cf. A262675 (same sequence sorted into ascending order).
Cf. also A270418, A270419, A270436 and permutation A273671.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 27 2016
